sentence.Network_en: Try to keep a clear-sighted view of your objective.
sentence.Network_cn: 对目标要有明确的认识。

sentence.Network_en: He was clear-sighted enough to keep a sense of perspective.
sentence.Network_cn: 他很有见识，能保持正确的判断力。

sentence.Network_en: Clear - sighted eyes and untried tears?
sentence.Network_cn: 清澈的眼眸和未哭的泪水?

entry.def: If you describe someone as clear-sighted, you admire them because they are able to understand situations well and to make sensible judgments and decisions about them.

example.ex: He was clear-sighted enough to keep a sense of perspective...
example.tran: 他很有见识，能保持正确的判断力。

example.ex: Try to keep a clear-sighted view of your objective.
example.tran: 对目标要有明确的认识。

sentences.sentence: "too clear-eyed not to see what problems would follow"
"chaos could be prevented only by clear-sighted leadership"
"much too perspicacious to be taken in by so spurious an argument"
